verbose_text: Treatment with tocilizumab markedly prevented the development of splenomegaly in male Il6ra hIL6R / hIL6R -hIL6 transgenic mice (XREF_FIG; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) : the spleen weights at the end of 4-week treatment were decreased to 0.14 +/- 0.03 g, 0.14 +/- 0.02 g and 0.13 +/- 0.03 g in groups treated with 0.1, 0.25 and 0.5 mg/body of tocilizumab, respectively.
evidence: tocilizumab markedly prevented the development of splenomegaly in male Il6ra hIL6R
